    Gou Tan (谭苟)

    Sun Yat-sen University

    • Ph.D. in CS, SYSU
    • Guangzhou, China
    • Email
    • Github
    • Google Scholar
    • ORCID

    📚 Biography: Gou Tan (谭苟 in Chinese) is currently a 2nd-year Ph.D. student at Sun Yat-Sen University (SYSU), supervised by Prof. Pengfei Chen and Prof. Chuanfu Zhang. Recently, he was awarded a CSC (China Scholarship Council) fellowship, and he will join the Singapore Management University (SMU), co-supervised by Prof. SHAR Lwin Khin and Prof. David Lo. He received a B.E. degree from Sun Yat-Sen University in 2022.

    💡Research Interest: AI Reliability, SE4AI, LLMOps, MLOps, AI4SE, AIOps.

    🔥 News

    • 2025.10:  🎉🎉 Our paper “LLMRCA: Multilevel Root Cause Analysis for LLM Applications Using Multimodal Observability Data” was accepted by TOSEM (CCF A).
    • 2025.09:  🎉🎉 Our paper “MOTSAD: Multi-Objective Optimization for Time Series Anomaly Detection in Microservice” was accepted by ICSOC’25 (CCF B).
    • 2025.06:  🎉🎉 Our paper “InferLog: Accelerating LLM Inference for Online Log Parsing via ICL-oriented Prefix Caching” was accepted by ICSE’26 (CCF A).
    • 2025.04:  🎉🎉 Our paper “A Survey on Failure Analysis and Fault Injection in AI Systems” was accepted by TOSEM (CCF A).
    • 2023.12:  🎉🎉 Our LLM-based AIOps solutions won 3rd place🥉 in the 2023 CCF International AIOps Challenge (1st🏅 among student teams).
    • 2023.10:  🎉🎉 Our paper “Online Data Drift Detection for Anomaly Detection Services based on Deep Learning towards Multivariate Time Series” was accepted by QRS’23 (CCF C).
